lead_paragraph: McELWREATH--Dorothy Uehlinger (nee: Karthaus). of Long Beach, NY on April 23, 2016. Devoted daughter of the late Edward and Regina. Dearest sister of the late Edward, the late Robert, and the late Eileen Donovan. Loving wife of the late Gerard P. Uehlinger and the late Robert J. McElwreath. Beloved mother of Marijane, Timothy, Edward (Mary Elizabeth), John (Ann), and Gerard Jr. Caring stepmother of the late Robert Jr., Maureen, Edward (Leslie), and Patricia (Dennis) Donohue. "Grandma Dot" to fifteen grandchildren, step-grandchildren, and six great-grandchildren. Lifelong friend and cousin to Eileen B. Muirhead and family. Reposing at Macken Mortuary, Rockville Centre Chapel, 52 Clinton Avenue, Thursday 7-9pm, Friday 2-4pm and 7-9pm. Funeral Mass St. Ignatius Martyr RC Church, Long Beach, NY, Saturday, 9:15am. Interment at Cemetery of the Holy Rood, Westbury, NY. www.mackenmortuary.com. 1

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  MCELWREATH, DOROTHY UEHLINGER (NEE: KARTHAUS). OF LONG BEACH, NY ON APRIL 23, 2016. DEVOTED DAUGHTER OF THE LATE EDWARD AND REGINA. DEAREST SISTER OF THE LATE EDWARD, THE LATE ROBERT, AND THE LATE EILEEN DONOVAN. LOVING WIFE OF THE LATE GERARD P. UEHLINGER AND THE LATE ROBERT J. MCELWREATH. BELOVED MOTHER OF MARIJANE, TIMOTHY, EDWARD (MARY ELIZABETH), JOHN (ANN), AND GERARD JR. CARING STEPMOTHER OF THE LATE ROBERT JR., MAUREEN, EDWARD (LESLIE), AND PATRICIA (DENNIS) DONOHUE. "GRANDMA DOT" TO FIFTEEN GRANDCHILDREN, STEP, GRANDCHILDREN, AND SIX GREAT, GRANDCHILDREN. LIFELONG FRIEND AND COUSIN TO EILEEN B. MUIRHEAD AND FAMILY. REPOSING AT MACKEN MORTUARY, ROCKVILLE CENTRE CHAPEL, 52 CLINTON AVENUE, THURSDAY 7, 9PM, FRIDAY 2, 4PM AND 7, 9PM. FUNERAL MASS ST. IGNATIUS MARTYR RC CHURCH, LONG BEACH, NY, SATURDAY, 9:15AM. INTERMENT AT CEMETERY OF THE HOLY ROOD, WESTBURY, NY. WWW.MACKENMORTUARY.COM. 1
